source.a204ae37:
hype = ["Blockchain", "Artificial Intelligence"]
stageSeed = ["Seed"]
stageRank = ["Series A", "Series B", "Series C", "Series D", "Series E", "Series F", "Series G"]
funding = "Funding Amount (USD)"
stage = "Funding Stage"
div = 1000000
source.bbd7652a:
hypeRankArr = hypeArr[hypeArr[stage].isin(stageRank)]
hypeSeedArr = hypeArr[hypeArr[stage].isin(stageSeed)]
notHypeRankArr = notHypeArr[notHypeArr[stage].isin(stageRank)]
notHypeSeedArr = notHypeArr[notHypeArr[stage].isin(stageSeed)]
source.acde5afc:
hypeRankSum = hypeRankArr[funding].loc[hypeRankArr[funding].str.isdigit()].astype(int).sum() / len(hypeRankArr) / div
hypeSeedSum = hypeSeedArr[funding].loc[hypeSeedArr[funding].str.isdigit()].astype(int).sum() / len(hypeSeedArr) / div
notHypeRankSum = notHypeRankArr[funding].loc[notHypeRankArr[funding].str.isdigit()].astype(int).sum() / len(notHypeRankArr) / div
notHypeSeedSum = notHypeSeedArr[funding].loc[notHypeSeedArr[funding].str.isdigit()].astype(int).sum() / len(notHypeSeedArr) / div
source.f47bc48a:
print("             " + "     Seed        " + "         Rank      " + "         Sum")
print("Hype      " + str(hypeSeedSum) + "      " + str(hypeRankSum) + "    " + str(hypeSeedSum + hypeRankSum))
print("Not Hype  " + str(notHypeSeedSum) + "    " + str(notHypeRankSum) + "    " + str(notHypeSeedSum + notHypeRankSum))
print("Sum       " + str(hypeSeedSum + notHypeSeedSum) + "     " + str(hypeRankSum + notHypeRankSum) + "   " + str(hypeSeedSum + hypeRankSum + notHypeSeedSum + notHypeRankSum))
source.eba95092:
E0 = ((hypeSeedSum + notHypeSeedSum) * (hypeSeedSum + hypeRankSum)) / (hypeSeedSum + hypeRankSum + notHypeSeedSum + notHypeRankSum) #(hypeRankSum + hypeSeedSum) / 2
E1 = ((hypeRankSum + notHypeRankSum) * (notHypeSeedSum + notHypeRankSum)) / (hypeSeedSum + hypeRankSum + notHypeSeedSum + notHypeRankSum) #(notHypeRankSum + notHypeSeedSum) / 2
